name: The Core(alpha release)
description:
The Core is a single level Metroidvania game I made for the jam. Venture deeper to slay the boss and reclaim the digital world.

Known bugs-- 

  • When you aim up-left while running, the jump button does not register
  • Knock back when hit can sometimes be very strong

Controls--

W-Aim up

S-Aim down

A/D-Move left/right

Numpad 5-Jump

Numpad4-Fire beam

Numpad 6-Fire missiles
